Title: MVVM Tombstone for Windows Phone
Description: MVVM Tombstone provides a simple method for tombstoning your ViewModel properties and restoring them when appropriate.
HomeWiki:
MVVM Tombstone for Windows Phone

MVVM Tombstone provides a simple method for tombstoning your ViewModel properties and restoring them when appropriate.

For an explanation on how to use this this, please look on this page:

http://www.kenneth-truyers.net/2013/03/13/tombstoning-made-easy-in-windows-phone-mvvm/

To install from nuget go here:

https://nuget.org/packages/WindowsPhone.MVVM.Tombstone/
